description: In just a few hours, you will learn how to draw, shade & paint a pretty mixed media girl's face. I will teach you step-by-step using simple techniques that anyone can master. You will receive video instruction along with some .pdf's to help you on your way. This course is perfect for a beginning artist, or anyone who has never been able to successfully create a pretty girl for their art journals, paintings, or any mixed media applications. Don't forget to check out my free video previews.
title: YOU can Draw, Shade and Paint a Mixed Media Girl...today!
